dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile appliation that allows rural providers to consult with trained urban doctors on complex and difficult to diagnose or treat cases in family planning, tuberculosis and MNCH. The system incorporates telediagnostic technologiest for measuring vital signs, teleconsultations, data collection tools and software that supports supply chain management.

Gobi Gopalakrishnan, President & Founder, World Health Partners, Email: gopi@worldhealthpartners.org| Tim Wood, Senior Program Officer, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, Email: tim.wood @gatesfoundation.org
Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, anonymous donor

Data collection and reporting, Electronic decison support, Human resource management, sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, Provider-to-provider communication, Supply chain management, Child health, Family planning, HIV/AIDS, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Nutrition, Parasitic diseases, Primary Care, Sexual and reproductive health, Tuberculosis, Violence, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
